title: Rams win the Super Bowl, Cooper Kupp is MVP, Nate Burleson on Stafford and OBJ, Bengals future, and Halftime Show
itunes:title: Rams win the Super Bowl, Cooper Kupp is MVP, Nate Burleson on Stafford and OBJ, Bengals future, and Halftime Show
description:
In this Super Bowl edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson discuss the Rams win over the Bengals. Cooper Kupp wins the MVP award and Aaron Donald sealed the victory. Nate Burleson drops by to highlight Matt Stafford's performance and the future of Odell Beckham Jr. Peter tells Bengals fans not to hang onto issues with the refs because the future with Burrow and Chase is so bright. The crew also gives their thoughts on the star-studded Halftime Show.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
